name: Carnage
description: The barbarian's attacks become so forceful as to impact others around the target enemy. For every successful melee attack, the barbarian makes reduced-damage attacks at all other enemies within a short distance of the target.
notes: The attack cannot crit, but can graze.
Damage is dealt as Raw damage, it bypasses all armor.
The Accuracy of the AoE attack does not take into account bonus accuracy from weapon stance/handing and enchantments, only from the wielder's class and level.

effects.value: 33% of Base Weapon Damage (as Raw) in Area on Weapon Hit
